Address.label: Address
Address.value: 128 VOULIAGMENIS AVENUE,3RD FLOOR, GLYFADA, ATHENS, 166 74, Greece

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Globus Maritime Ltd is a dry bulk shipping company which provides marine transportation services internationally. The company owns, operates and manages a fleet of dry bulk vessels that transport iron ore, coal, grain, steel products, cement, alumina and other dry bulk cargos. Its operations are managed by its subsidiary which also provides in-house commercial and technical management for its vessels and also offers consulting services for an affiliated ship management company.

value.name: Athanasios K. Feidakis
value.title: President, Chief Executive Officer, CFO & Director
